name: Fan Rotom
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

abilities.name: Roto Motor
abilities.effect: If you have 9 or more Pokémon Tool cards in your discard pile, ignore all Energy in the attack cost of each of this Pokémon’s attacks.

attacks.name: Spinning Fan
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
